definition: to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)

sentences.english: The condition of the people was one of local self-sufficiency, and local customs displaced formal law.
sentences.chinese: 人們自給自足地生活，用地方慣例代替正規法律。

sentences.english: It is a neurosis which feeds upon itself .
sentences.chinese: 這是一種自給自足的神經官能症。

sentences.english: Develop and modify your homestead development plan and its self-supporting income base.
sentences.chinese: 制定和修改您仕達發展計劃及其自給收入基數。

sentences.english: Will be self-supporting after your club's support ends.
sentences.chinese: 在貴社的支持結束之後能自給自足。

sentences.english: In emergency situations, self-contained breathing apparatus (SCBA) may be required.
sentences.chinese: 在緊急情況下，可能要求有自給式呼吸器。

sentences.english: Today Britain is not only self-sufficient in oil but also has a surplus for export. The transport and domestic heating systems mostly depend on oil.
sentences.chinese: 今天英國的石油不僅能自給自足，還有盈餘供出口。

sentences.english: Once completed, it is designed to be 85% self-sufficient in energy.
sentences.chinese: 建成後，它的能源自給自足率能達到85%。

sentences.english: The domestic content ratio is only 30%.
These actions will give us greater self-sufficiency and freedom of movement.
sentences.chinese: 這些政策將使我們更加自給自足，行動更加自由。

sentences.english: I want to a little plant, which is able to feed itself.
sentences.chinese: 我想做一株小植物，自給自足。

sentences.english: The ministry of agriculture, for example, wants to increase self-sufficiency in food.
sentences.chinese: 例如，農業大臣希望在食品行業增加自給自足的程度。

sentences.english: Self-sufficiency and economic isolation provided the most secure means of survival.
sentences.chinese: 自給自足和經濟孤立提供了最保險的生存手段。

sentences.english: Returning to the olden days, when we raised our own fruits and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 像是回到了從前，我們種植水果蔬菜自給自足的日子。

sentences.english: Automobile oil-saving, non-energy, self-feeding generator set.
sentences.chinese: 汽車節油，無能源，自給式，發電機組。

sentences.english: Grain self-sufficiency, but the need to import a small portion of wheat.
sentences.chinese: 糧食基本自給，但需進口一小部分小麥。

sentences.english: The Energy Roof is self-sufficient and is powered by both the wind and the sun.
sentences.chinese: 能量屋頂由風能和太陽能驅動，能做到自給自足。

definition: family livelihood/a household's economic situation/family property
mulberry farming/to grow mulberry for sericulture
fishing and hunting/fig. to loot/to plunder
